name: Ragnarök Chess
description:
The classical game of chess... now played in the beautiful Viking Lands! Play chess against your friends or versus the computer, unlock new scenarios and chess pieces and prove yourself to be the most fearless Viking alive!

Features:

  • Play against the computer with 3 different difficult levels;
  • Unlock up to 12 beautiful scenarios for you to play in;
  • Unlock 2 more Chess Pieces, with more elaborate design and armor;
  • Play against your friends locally or just have fun against the computer;
  • Originally composed soundtrack to get you in the mood;
